name: My Tower Physics - Stacking 8-Bit Build-ing Blocks in the Pixelated Cube World
name_original: My Tower Physics - Stacking 8-Bit Build-ing Blocks in the Pixelated Cube World
description:
"My Tower Physics - Stacking 8-Bit Blocks in the Pixelated Cube World" challenges you build to build the highest tower in the Mycraft Tower universe! Stack as many blocks as you can and keep your tower from falling to the ground!

Take your My Tower Physics skills online and battle your friends via Facebook or start a random quick game with other online players! Multiplayer is INCLUDED FOR FREE.


Try This FREE Game Now before the price goes up!
